        <script type="text/javascript">
        (function() {
            var purl = window.location.href;
            // Already updated Time Magazine Account ID (161125) and IH Profile ID (5493) in the URL
            var url = '//ads.pubmatic.com/AdServer/js/pwt/161125/5493';
            var profileVersionId = '';
            if(purl.indexOf('pwtv=')>0){
                var regexp = /pwtv=(.*?)(&|$)/g;
                var matches = regexp.exec(purl);
                if(matches.length >= 2 && matches[1].length > 0){
                    profileVersionId = '/'+matches[1];
                }
            }
            var wtads = document.createElement('script');
            wtads.async = true;
            wtads.type = 'text/javascript';
            wtads.src = url+profileVersionId+'/pwt.js';
            var node = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            node.parentNode.insertBefore(wtads, node);
        })();
        </script>

                      <a href="https://get.time.com/servlet/OrdersGateway?cds_mag_code=TIM&cds_page_id=265727&cds_response_key=SCCGSTR04">TIME Storefront</a>
                      <a href="https://time.com/help">Help Center</a>
                      <a rel="nofollow" class="signout-button" href="">Sign Out</a>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <a class="subscribe-link subscribe-link-container subx_track_952 hidden" href="/subscribe-header-time" target="_blank" data-location="homepage-nav" data-event="1" data-key="qobuskf@g">
                            Subscribe
                  </a>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>    <div class="container primary">
              <div class="container-inner  left">
                <button id="button-in-unless" class="menu-btn" title="Menu" aria-label="Menu">
                  <div class="menu-btn-box">
                    <div class="menu-btn-inner"></div>
                  </div>
                </button>
                <div class="logo" id="">
                  <a href="/"
                    data-action="primary-nav-logo" aria-label="Logo">
                      <svg role="img" itemprop="logo" width="90px" height="100%" preserveAspectRatio="xMinYMin meet" viewBox="0 0 98 32" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
                        <title>TIME logo</title>
                        <path fill="#e90606" d="M3 2.36h23.67v5.4h-.43l.05-3.46h-9.35v24.36h2.7v.8H10.4v-.8h2.5V4.3H3.45v3.46H3v-5.4zM27.8 2.36h9.3v.75h-2.65v25.56h2.64v.8h-9.3v-.8h2.7V3.1h-2.7v-.74zM45.3 2.3h1.78l8.7 20.9 8.64-20.9h1.73L71 28.66h2.44v.8h-9.6v-.8h2.47l-3-16.85-7.68 17.67h-1.8l-7.6-17.66-3.2 16.86h2.33l-.05.8h-7.07l.05-.8h2.16L45.3 2.3zM74.25 2.36h20.47l.05 5.35h-.37l-.17-3.3-13.4-.15v10.7h11.4l.27-2.5h.5c-.12 2.28-.12 4.5 0 6.76h-.5l-.27-2.58h-11.4V27.7h13.9l.04-3.68h.38v5.45h-20.9v-.76l2.7-.04V3.16l-2.7-.05v-.74z"/>
                      </svg>
                  </a>
                </div>
              </div>

          </nav>
        
          <div class="menu-overlay"></div>
        
          	<div class="component adhesion-ad mobile-ad">
          	 	<div class="adhesion-ad-container">
          	    	<div
          	    	  id='stickyfooter-ad-1'
          	    	  class='ad ad-container ad-wrapper mobile-ad'
          	    	  role='complementary'
          	    	  aria-hidden='true'
          	    	>

              id='leaderboard-ad-1'
              class='ad ad-container ad-wrapper desktop-ad'
              role='complementary'

            </div>  </div>
        </header>
        
        
    <main class="homepage-wrapper">
  <section class="homepage-section-v2 lede" data-module_name="Lede Stories">
    <h2 class="visually-hidden">Lede Stories</h2>
          <div class="feature" >
        <article class="slide">
              <div class="image-container">
                <a href="/6247483/biden-classified-documents-timeline/">
        <div class="partial aspect-ratio-box" style="--aspect-ratio:1.5; --mobile-aspect-ratio:1;">
                        <picture>
                          <source media="(max-width: 767px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/biden.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;600&amp;h&#x3D;600&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;600,600">
                          <source media="(min-width: 768px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/biden.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;616&amp;h&#x3D;411&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;616,411, https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/biden.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617 1.5x, https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/biden.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;1024&amp;h&#x3D;683&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;1024,683 2x">
                          <img src="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/biden.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617"  alt="Bidens Classified Documents: A Timeline of What We Know " fetchpriority="high"/>
                        </picture>
        </div>        </a>
        
                <span class="fig-credit">
                  MANDEL NGANAFP/Getty Images
                </span>
              </div>
            <div class="dek">
              <a href="/6247483/biden-classified-documents-timeline/">
                <h3 class="title no-eyebrow">Bidens Classified Documents: A Timeline of What We Know </h3>
              </a>
                <time class="timestamp published-date display-inline">
                  January 14, 2023  3:47 PM EST
                </time>
        
              <p class="summary">
                  On Jan. 14, the White House announced that five more documents were found at Bidens Wilmington residence
              </p>
            </div>
        </article>          </div>
          <div class="secondary" >

  <section class="homepage-section-v2 topic-section" data-module_name="Spotlight Topic | Editor&#x27;s Picks">
      <div class="topic-section-wrapper">
        <div class="topic-section__header">
            <h2 class="section-heading topic-section__header-title">Editor&#x27;s Picks</h2>
            <a class="topic-section__header-cta" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://time.com/newsletters/?source&#x3D;SI+hp+link+mid+&amp;newsletter_name&#x3D;inside_time">Subscribe to the Inside Time newsletter</a>
        </div>

        
        <div class="component mobile-carousel variation-topic"  data-items-count=4>
          <span class="story-count">4 stories</span>
          <div class="item-selectors">
            <form>
              <nav>
                  <input id="6241916-carousel-item-0" type="radio" name="item-selector-dots" value=0 checked>
                  <label for="6241916-carousel-item-0">Go to item 0</label>
                  <input id="6243350-carousel-item-1" type="radio" name="item-selector-dots" value=1 >
                  <label for="6243350-carousel-item-1">Go to item 1</label>
                  <input id="6078607-carousel-item-2" type="radio" name="item-selector-dots" value=2 >
                  <label for="6078607-carousel-item-2">Go to item 2</label>
                  <input id="6242643-carousel-item-3" type="radio" name="item-selector-dots" value=3 >
                  <label for="6242643-carousel-item-3">Go to item 3</label>
              </nav>
            </form>
          </div>
          <ul class="tout__list items swipe-h">
              <li id="6241916-item" class="item tout__list-item selected show-credit   show " data-index=0>
                  <a class="tout__list-item-link" href="/collection/happiness-revival-guide/">
                    <article class="tout__list-item-inner ">
                        <div class="tout__list-item-image">
        <div class="partial aspect-ratio-box" style="--aspect-ratio:1.5; --mobile-aspect-ratio:1;">
                              <picture>
                                <source media="(max-width: 767px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/happy.featured.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;crop&#x3D;699px%2C114px%2C1065px%2C1064px&amp;resize&#x3D;600,600&amp;strip">

        </div>                </div>

                      </li>
              <li id="6243350-item" class="item tout__list-item  show " data-index=1>

                    <h3 class="title">2022: A Year In Review</h3>
                    <span class="date-and-duration">Dec 21, 2022<span class="divider">|</span>4:01</span>
                  </div>
                  <div class="info-right">
                    <p class="description">Following years of uncertaintyand a global pandemic that has proven to be one of the most challenging events in historywe forged on, prepared to tackle what lay ahead. And as we continued to extract the possible from the impossible, this year taught us, above all, that our voicesno matter how big or smallcan change the world.</p>

            </li>
            <li class="latest-stories__item">
              <a href="/6247465/ukraine-russia-missiles/">
                <h3 class="latest-stories__item-headline">U.K. to Supply Tanks to Ukraine </h3>
              </a>
              <time class="latest-stories__item-timestamp">
                January 14, 2023  10:39 AM EST
              </time>
            </li>
            <li class="latest-stories__item">
              <a href="/6247458/mega-millions-jackpot-maine-win/">
                <h3 class="latest-stories__item-headline">Winning Ticket for $1.35 Billion Mega Millions Jackpot Sold</h3>
              </a>
              <time class="latest-stories__item-timestamp">
                January 14, 2023  9:36 AM EST
              </time>
            </li>
          </ul>
        </div>    </section>

  <section class="homepage-section-v2 mag-subs" data-module_name="Magazine Subscription">
    <div class="mag-subs-inner">
      <div class="content">
        <p>Subscribe now to get unlimited access to<a class="c-link" href="http://time.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" data-stringify-link="http://TIME.com" data-sk="tooltip_parent" data-remove-tab-index="true">TIME.com</a>and more!</p><ul><li>TIME Digital Magazine</li><li>Inside TIME Newsletter, emailed twice weekly</li><li>Discounts at the TIME Cover Store</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p>

    <section class="homepage-section-v2 topic-section topic-section--trending" data-module_name="Topic Section | 1 | Coronavirus In-Depth">
      <div class="topic-section-wrapper">
        <div class="topic-section__header">
            <a href="https://time.com/tag/covid-19/">
              <h2 class="section-heading topic-section__header-title">Coronavirus In-Depth<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width=24 height=24 viewBox="0 0 24 24" role="img" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><polygon points="10 6 8.59 7.41 13.17 12 8.59 16.59 10 18 16 12"></polygon></svg></h2>
            </a>
            <a class="topic-section__header-cta" target="_blank" href="https://time.com/newsletters/?source&#x3D;SI+hp+link+mid+&amp;newsletter_name&#x3D;coronavirus" rel="noopener noreferrer">Subscribe to the Coronavirus Brief</a>
        </div>
        
        <div class="component mobile-carousel variation-topic"  data-items-count=5>
          <span class="story-count">5 stories</span>
          <div class="item-selectors">
            <form>
              <nav>
                  <input id="6242342-carousel-item-0" type="radio" name="item-selector-dots" value=0 checked>

              </nav>

          <ul class="tout__list items swipe-h">
              <li id="6242342-item" class="item tout__list-item selected show-credit   show " data-index=0>
                  <a class="tout__list-item-link" href="/6242342/dr-anthony-fauci-stepping-down/">
                    <article class="tout__list-item-inner ">
                        <div class="tout__list-item-image">
        <div class="partial aspect-ratio-box" style="--aspect-ratio:1.5; --mobile-aspect-ratio:1;">
                              <picture>
                                <source media="(max-width: 767px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/anthony-fauci-jody-rogac-exit-interview.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;crop&#x3D;0px%2C218px%2C1825px%2C1825px&amp;resize&#x3D;600,600&amp;strip">
                                <source media="(min-width: 768px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/anthony-fauci-jody-rogac-exit-interview.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;crop&#x3D;0px%2C187px%2C1825px%2C1219px&amp;resize&#x3D;616,411&amp;strip, https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/anthony-fauci-jody-rogac-exit-interview.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;crop&#x3D;0px%2C187px%2C1825px%2C1219px&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617&amp;strip 1.5x">
                                <img src="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/anthony-fauci-jody-rogac-exit-interview.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;crop&#x3D;0px%2C187px%2C1825px%2C1219px&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617&amp;strip" loading="lazy" alt="" />
                              </picture>
        </div>                    <span class="tout__list-item-image-credit">
                              Jody Rogac for TIME
                            </span>
                        </div>
        
                      <div class="tout__list-item-text">
                        <h3 class="tout__list-item-title">Dr. Anthony Fauci Is Stepping Down. Heres His Advice For His Successor</h3>
                            <p class="tout__list-item-description">He hopes to impart a few lessons.</p>
                      </div>
                    </article>
                  </a>
                      </li>
              <li id="6244167-item" class="item tout__list-item  show " data-index=1>
                  <a class="tout__list-item-link" href="/6244167/covid-19-variant-xbb15/">
                    <article class="tout__list-item-inner ">
                        <div class="tout__list-item-image">
        <div class="partial aspect-ratio-box" style="--aspect-ratio:1.5; --mobile-aspect-ratio:1;">
                              <picture>
                                <source media="(max-width: 767px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/new-covid-variant.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;600&amp;h&#x3D;600&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;600,600">
                                <source media="(min-width: 768px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/new-covid-variant.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;616&amp;h&#x3D;411&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;616,411, https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/new-covid-variant.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617 1.5x">

                              </picture>
        </div>                </div>
        
                      <div class="tout__list-item-text">
                        <h3 class="tout__list-item-title">What to Know About the New XBB.1.5 Variant</h3>
                      </div>
                    </article>
                  </a>
                      </li>
              <li id="6242029-item" class="item tout__list-item  show " data-index=2>
                  <a class="tout__list-item-link" href="/6242029/covid-19-vaccine-culture-war-politics/">
                    <article class="tout__list-item-inner ">
                        <div class="tout__list-item-image">
        <div class="partial aspect-ratio-box" style="--aspect-ratio:1.5; --mobile-aspect-ratio:1;">
                              <picture>
                                <source media="(max-width: 767px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/GettyImages-1238710198.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;600&amp;h&#x3D;600&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;600,600">
                                <source media="(min-width: 768px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/GettyImages-1238710198.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;616&amp;h&#x3D;411&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;616,411, https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/GettyImages-1238710198.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617 1.5x">
                                <img src="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/GettyImages-1238710198.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617" loading="lazy" alt="" />
                              </picture>
        </div>                </div>
        
                      <div class="tout__list-item-text">
                        <h3 class="tout__list-item-title">Why the Culture War Is Turning Back to COVID</h3>
                      </div>
                    </article>
                  </a>
                      </li>
              <li id="6240499-item" class="item tout__list-item  show " data-index=3>
                  <a class="tout__list-item-link" href="/6240499/how-covid-19-immunity-works-vaccines-infections/">
                    <article class="tout__list-item-inner ">
                        <div class="tout__list-item-image">
        <div class="partial aspect-ratio-box" style="--aspect-ratio:1.5; --mobile-aspect-ratio:1;">
                              <picture>
                                <source media="(max-width: 767px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/GettyImages-1369145550.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;600&amp;h&#x3D;600&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;600,600">
                                <source media="(min-width: 768px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/GettyImages-1369145550.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;616&amp;h&#x3D;411&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;616,411, https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/GettyImages-1369145550.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617 1.5x">
                                <img src="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/GettyImages-1369145550.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617" loading="lazy" alt="" />
                              </picture>
        </div>                </div>
        
                      <div class="tout__list-item-text">
                        <h3 class="tout__list-item-title">How COVID-19 Immunity Works at This Point in the Pandemic</h3>
                      </div>
                    </article>
                  </a>
                      </li>
              <li id="6240058-item" class="item tout__list-item " data-index=4>
                  <a class="tout__list-item-link" href="/6240058/post-viral-illnesses-common-long-covid/">
                    <article class="tout__list-item-inner ">
                        <div class="tout__list-item-image">
        <div class="partial aspect-ratio-box" style="--aspect-ratio:1.5; --mobile-aspect-ratio:1;">
                              <picture>
                                <source media="(max-width: 767px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/post-viral-illness.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;600&amp;h&#x3D;600&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;600,600">
                                <source media="(min-width: 768px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/post-viral-illness.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;616&amp;h&#x3D;411&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;616,411, https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/post-viral-illness.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617 1.5x">
                                <img src="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/post-viral-illness.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617" loading="lazy" alt="" />
                              </picture>
        </div>                </div>
        
                      <div class="tout__list-item-text">
                        <h3 class="tout__list-item-title">Long COVID Isn't the Only Post-Viral Illness</h3>
                      </div>
                    </article>
                  </a>
                      </li>
          </ul>
          <div class="gradient-start">
            <span class="chevron-left"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width=24 height=24 viewBox="0 0 24 24" role="img" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><polygon points="15.41 7.41 14 6 8 12 14 18 15.41 16.59 10.83 12"></polygon></svg></span>
          </div>
          <div class="gradient-end">
            <span class="chevron-right"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width=24 height=24 viewBox="0 0 24 24" role="img" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><polygon points="10 6 8.59 7.41 13.17 12 8.59 16.59 10 18 16 12"></polygon></svg></span>
          </div>

    </section>

    <section class="homepage-section-v2 topic-section" data-module_name="Topic Section | 3 | Race in America">
      <div class="topic-section-wrapper">
        <div class="topic-section__header">
            <a href="https://time.com/tag/identity">
              <h2 class="section-heading topic-section__header-title">Race in America<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width=24 height=24 viewBox="0 0 24 24" role="img" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><polygon points="10 6 8.59 7.41 13.17 12 8.59 16.59 10 18 16 12"></polygon></svg></h2>
            </a>
        </div>
        
        <div class="component mobile-carousel variation-topic" id="nativo-slide-2" data-items-count=5>
          <span class="story-count">5 stories</span>
          <div class="item-selectors">
            <form>
              <nav>
                  <input id="6240424-carousel-item-0" type="radio" name="item-selector-dots" value=0 checked>
                  <label for="6240424-carousel-item-0">Go to item 0</label>

                  <input id="6227993-carousel-item-4" type="radio" name="item-selector-dots" value=4 >
                  <label for="6227993-carousel-item-4">Go to item 4</label>
              </nav>
            </form>
          </div>
          <ul class="tout__list items swipe-h">
              <li id="6240424-item" class="item tout__list-item selected show-credit   show " data-index=0>
                  <a class="tout__list-item-link" href="/6240424/progressives-failed-to-heed-lbjs-final-warning/">
                    <article class="tout__list-item-inner ">
                        <div class="tout__list-item-image">
        <div class="partial aspect-ratio-box" style="--aspect-ratio:1.5; --mobile-aspect-ratio:1;">
                              <picture>
                                <source media="(max-width: 767px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/GettyImages-559143929.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;600&amp;h&#x3D;600&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;600,600">
                                <source media="(min-width: 768px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/GettyImages-559143929.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;616&amp;h&#x3D;411&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;616,411, https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/GettyImages-559143929.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617 1.5x">
                                <img src="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/GettyImages-559143929.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617" loading="lazy" alt="" />
                              </picture>
        </div>                </div>
        
                      <div class="tout__list-item-text">
                        <h3 class="tout__list-item-title">Progressives Have Failed to Heed LBJs Final Warning</h3>
                            <p class="tout__list-item-description">LBJ warned that public needed to be convinced of the link between racial equity and economic opportunity. His advice rings true today</p>
                      </div>
                    </article>
                  </a>
                      </li>
              <li id="6243296-item" class="item tout__list-item  show " data-index=1>
                  <a class="tout__list-item-link" href="/6243296/hakeem-jeffries-first-congress/">
                    <article class="tout__list-item-inner ">
                        <div class="tout__list-item-image">
        <div class="partial aspect-ratio-box" style="--aspect-ratio:1.5; --mobile-aspect-ratio:1;">
                              <picture>
                                <source media="(max-width: 767px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Jeffries.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;600&amp;h&#x3D;600&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;600,600">
                                <source media="(min-width: 768px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Jeffries.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;616&amp;h&#x3D;411&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;616,411, https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Jeffries.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617 1.5x">
                                <img src="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Jeffries.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617" loading="lazy" alt="" />
                              </picture>
        </div>                </div>
        
                      <div class="tout__list-item-text">
                        <h3 class="tout__list-item-title">Hakeem Jeffries and the Perils of Being a 'First'</h3>
                      </div>
                    </article>
                  </a>
                      </li>
              <li id="6235636-item" class="item tout__list-item  show " data-index=2>
                  <a class="tout__list-item-link" href="/6235636/life-expectancy-black-americans-progress/">
                    <article class="tout__list-item-inner ">
                        <div class="tout__list-item-image">
        <div class="partial aspect-ratio-box" style="--aspect-ratio:1.5; --mobile-aspect-ratio:1;">
                              <picture>
                                <source media="(max-width: 767px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Black-Progess-2022.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;600&amp;h&#x3D;600&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;600,600">
                                <source media="(min-width: 768px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Black-Progess-2022.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;616&amp;h&#x3D;411&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;616,411, https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Black-Progess-2022.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617 1.5x">
                                <img src="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Black-Progess-2022.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617" loading="lazy" alt="" />
                              </picture>
        </div>                </div>
        
                      <div class="tout__list-item-text">
                        <h3 class="tout__list-item-title">Life Expectancy Proves How Far Black Americans Have Come</h3>
                      </div>
                    </article>
                  </a>
                      </li>
              <li id="6236517-item" class="item tout__list-item  show " data-index=3>
                  <a class="tout__list-item-link" href="/6236517/racism-hate-crime-mental-health/">
                    <article class="tout__list-item-inner ">
                        <div class="tout__list-item-image">
        <div class="partial aspect-ratio-box" style="--aspect-ratio:1.5; --mobile-aspect-ratio:1;">
                              <picture>
                                <source media="(max-width: 767px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/extreme-racism-02.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;600&amp;h&#x3D;600&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;600,600">
                                <source media="(min-width: 768px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/extreme-racism-02.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;616&amp;h&#x3D;411&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;616,411, https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/extreme-racism-02.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617 1.5x">
                                <img src="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/extreme-racism-02.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617" loading="lazy" alt="" />
                              </picture>
        </div>                </div>
        
                      <div class="tout__list-item-text">
                        <h3 class="tout__list-item-title">Racism Is Not a Mental IllnessBut Its Complicated</h3>
                      </div>
                    </article>
                  </a>
                      </li>
              <li id="6227993-item" class="item tout__list-item " data-index=4>
                  <a class="tout__list-item-link" href="/6227993/white-women-perfection-anti-racism/">
                    <article class="tout__list-item-inner hp-ntv-80b006b1-a83a-4465-b28e-cb315eafa2cf">
                        <div class="tout__list-item-image">
        <div class="partial aspect-ratio-box" style="--aspect-ratio:1.5; --mobile-aspect-ratio:1;">
                              <picture>
                                <source media="(max-width: 767px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/white-woman-pixelated.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;600&amp;h&#x3D;600&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;600,600">
                                <source media="(min-width: 768px)" srcset="https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/white-woman-pixelated.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;616&amp;h&#x3D;411&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;616,411, https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/white-woman-pixelated.jpg?quality&#x3D;85&amp;w&#x3D;925&amp;h&#x3D;617&amp;crop&#x3D;1&amp;resize&#x3D;925,617 1.5x">

                              </picture>
        </div>                </div>
        
                      <div class="tout__list-item-text">
                        <h3 class="tout__list-item-title">White Women Must Do More To Confront Racism</h3>
                      </div>
                    </article>
                  </a>
                      </li>
          </ul>

              <h2 class="section-heading topic-section__header-title">Future of Work<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width=24 height=24 viewBox="0 0 24 24" role="img" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><polygon points="10 6 8.59 7.41 13.17 12 8.59 16.59 10 18 16 12"></polygon></svg></h2>

              <li id="6243814-item" class="item tout__list-item  show " data-index=3>
                  <a class="tout__list-item-link" href="/charter/6243814/the-best-workplace-lessons-we-learned-from-books-this-year/">
                    <article class="tout__list-item-inner ">

        </div>                </div>
        
                      <div class="tout__list-item-text">
                        <h3 class="tout__list-item-title">The Best Workplace Lessons We Learned from Books This Year</h3>
                      </div>
                    </article>
                  </a>

          </ul>
          <div class="gradient-start">
            <span class="chevron-left"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width=24 height=24 viewBox="0 0 24 24" role="img" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><polygon points="15.41 7.41 14 6 8 12 14 18 15.41 16.59 10.83 12"></polygon></svg></span>
          </div>
          <div class="gradient-end">
            <span class="chevron-right"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width=24 height=24 viewBox="0 0 24 24" role="img" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><polygon points="10 6 8.59 7.41 13.17 12 8.59 16.59 10 18 16 12"></polygon></svg></span>
          </div>
        </div>      </div>
    </section>

    <section class="homepage-section-v2 topic-section" data-module_name="Topic Section | 7 | Climate Is Everything">
      <div class="topic-section-wrapper">
        <div class="topic-section__header">
            <a href="https://time.com/tag/climate-change/">
              <h2 class="section-heading topic-section__header-title">Climate Is Everything<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width=24 height=24 viewBox="0 0 24 24" role="img" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><polygon points="10 6 8.59 7.41 13.17 12 8.59 16.59 10 18 16 12"></polygon></svg></h2>
            </a>
            <a class="topic-section__header-cta" target="_blank" href="https://time.com/newsletters/?source&#x3D;SI+hp+link+mid+&amp;newsletter_name&#x3D;climate" rel="noopener noreferrer">Subscribe to the climate newsletter</a>
        </div>
        
        <div class="component mobile-carousel variation-topic"  data-items-count=5>
          <span class="story-count">5 stories</span>
          <div class="item-selectors">
            <form>

                </a>
